original_text:
But better than both
    is the one who has never been born,
who has not seen the evil
    that is done under the sun.
korean_text: 이 둘보다도 아직 출생하지 아니하여 해 아래에서 행하는 악한 일을 보지 못한 자가 더 복되다 하였노라

sentences.original_text: is the one who has never been born
who has not seen the evil
that is done under the sun
